archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.4.4b: b) mandating the security activities required (e.g. adopting secure programming techniques, performing detailed threat modelling and undertaking rigorous independent reviews) for each development project.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
